The world would be a lot quieter, as music would be the only way for people to express themselves and communicate their thoughts and feelings.
It would be difficult for people to convey complex ideas and emotions, as music is a subjective form of communication that can be interpreted differently by different people.
The absence of other forms of communication, such as language, would make it challenging for people to understand each other's needs and wants, and to negotiate and resolve conflicts.
The absence of other forms of communication would also make it difficult for people to share information and knowledge, as music is not a very efficient way to convey complex ideas or information.

It would be challenging for people to connect with each other on a personal level, as music is a form of communication that relies on emotional connection and empathy, which can be difficult to establish without other forms of communication.
